formElement.label: Project Name
formElement.documentation: Choose a project to transform into a plugin.

formElement.label: Plugin name
formElement.documentation: The name of the plugin to create. If left empty, it will default to the project name.

formElement.label: Category
formElement.documentation: Category of the plugin. It helps filter the search for the plugin and its procedures in the picker list.

formElement.label: Version
formElement.documentation: The version of the plugin to create.

formElement.label: Description
formElement.documentation: Description of the plugin. If left empty, it will default to the description of the project.

formElement.label: Comment
formElement.documentation: Comment to add to the CHANGELOG.

formElement.label: Fix self references
formElement.documentation: Replace self reference to your project by an empty string.

formElement.label: Create Artifact
formElement.documentation: Save the new created Plugin as an artifact version.

formElement.label: Install Plugin
formElement.documentation: Check to install the plugin automatically after successful creation.

formElement.label: Promote Plugin
formElement.documentation: Check to promote the plugin automatically after successful installation.

formElement.label: Move old Jobs
formElement.documentation: A boolean to indicate if you want to move the jobs associated to the previous version of the plugin upon promotion of the new version.
